name: Thomas P. Hayes
content: Thomas P. Hayes Thomas P. Hayes I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the University at Buffalo. You can find most of my research publications on my Google scholar page This website under construction as of 1/20/2025. This semester, Spring 2025, I am teaching these classes: CSE 191 Intro Discrete Structures CSE 331 Algorithms and Complexity (Websites under construction!)
